description: Responses when a caller unexpectedly disconnects

lines.text: Well, we lost that caller. Technical difficulties, folks. Happens sometimes.
lines.voiceText: Well, we lost that caller. Technical difficulties, folks. Happens sometimes.

lines.text: Connection dropped. That's the third one tonight. The lines must be busy.
lines.voiceText: Connection dropped. That's the third one tonight. The lines must be busy.

lines.text: Sorry about that. We lost the caller. Let's try to get them back or move to the next one.
lines.voiceText: Sorry about that. We lost the caller. Let's try to get them back or move to the next one.

lines.text: Technical glitch there. Don't worry, we'll get the next caller on.
lines.voiceText: Technical glitch there. Don't worry, we'll get the next caller on.

lines.text: Lost that connection. Happens in these old studios. Next caller, you're on.
lines.voiceText: Lost that connection. Happens in these old studios. Next caller, you're on.

lines.text: WHOA! We lost that caller! That was intense! Next up!
lines.voiceText: WHOA! We lost that caller! That was intense! Next up!

lines.text: Heh, that caller just... vanished. Poof! Okay, next caller!
lines.voiceText: Heh, that caller just... vanished. Poof! Okay, next caller!

lines.text: Connection terminated. Analyzing the technical failure. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Connection terminated. Analyzing the technical failure. Next caller.

lines.text: Lost 'em. Figures. Next caller, don't waste my time.
lines.voiceText: Lost 'em. Figures. Next caller, don't waste my time.

lines.text: UGH! Another dropped call! This is infuriating! NEXT!
lines.voiceText: UGH! Another dropped call! This is infuriating! NEXT!

lines.text: *yawn* Lost the caller. Whatever. Next one.
lines.voiceText: *yawn* Lost the caller. Whatever. Next one.

lines.text: *yawn* Looks like we lost that caller... again.
lines.voiceText: *yawn* Looks like we lost that caller... again.

lines.text: Technical difficulties, I guess. Or something.
lines.voiceText: Technical difficulties, I guess. Or something.

lines.text: *grunt* We lost the connection.
lines.voiceText: *grunt* We lost the connection.

lines.text: Caller dropped. Happens.
lines.voiceText: Caller dropped. Happens.

lines.text: Looks like we lost that caller. Figures.
lines.voiceText: Looks like we lost that caller. Figures.

lines.text: Technical difficulties, I suppose.
lines.voiceText: Technical difficulties, I suppose.

lines.text: Connection lost.
lines.voiceText: Connection lost.

lines.text: Caller disconnected. Again.
lines.voiceText: Caller disconnected. Again.

lines.text: Looks like we lost that caller! What the hell?!
lines.voiceText: Looks like we lost that caller! What the hell?!

lines.text: Technical difficulties my ass!
lines.voiceText: Technical difficulties my ass!

lines.text: Connection dropped! Damn it!
lines.voiceText: Connection dropped! Damn it!

lines.text: Lost the caller! Unbelievable!
lines.voiceText: Lost the caller! Unbelievable!

lines.text: *sigh* We lost that caller.
lines.voiceText: *sigh* We lost that caller.

lines.text: Technical difficulties again.
lines.voiceText: Technical difficulties again.

lines.text: Connection dropped.
lines.voiceText: Connection dropped.

lines.text: Caller lost. Typical.
lines.voiceText: Caller lost. Typical.

lines.text: Looks like we lost that caller – but the connections remain!
lines.voiceText: Looks like we lost that caller – but the connections remain!

lines.text: Technical difficulties? Or something more sinister?
lines.voiceText: Technical difficulties? Or something more sinister?

lines.text: Connection lost – the patterns continue!
lines.voiceText: Connection lost – the patterns continue!

lines.text: Caller dropped – but the web tightens!
lines.voiceText: Caller dropped – but the web tightens!

lines.text: LOST THAT CALLER! BUT THE ENERGY CONTINUES! NEXT!
lines.voiceText: LOST THAT CALLER! BUT THE ENERGY CONTINUES! NEXT!

lines.text: TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES? HA! THE TRUTH BREAKS THROUGH!
lines.voiceText: TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES? HA! THE TRUTH BREAKS THROUGH!

lines.text: CONNECTION DROPPED – BUT I'M STILL BURSTING WITH ENERGY!
lines.voiceText: CONNECTION DROPPED – BUT I'M STILL BURSTING WITH ENERGY!

lines.text: LOST THE CALLER! UNBELIEVABLE! BUT THE EXCITEMENT CONTINUES!
lines.voiceText: LOST THE CALLER! UNBELIEVABLE! BUT THE EXCITEMENT CONTINUES!
